remarks.format: ## Remarks Keytip 必须介于 1 到 3 个大写字符，不能包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时也称为访问密钥或加速器和用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 快捷键提示出现在按下 ALT 键。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当应用程序代码或内部进程（如重新生成布局处理过程）调用 方法时，均会调用此方法。This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the method.
